message.content:
cs.HC, cs.AI, cs.CY, cs.SI, cs.LG 

The paper discusses the need for a new approach to human-computer interaction that integrates with cognitive systems research, which is a topic covered in the Human-Computer Interaction (cs.HC) sub-category. The paper also discusses the role of intelligent agents and their interaction, which falls under the Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) sub-category. The paper also touches on the topic of cybersecurity (cs.CY) as intentional systems that provide resistance to the human agent can also be used to prevent cyber attacks. The paper also discusses the use of intentional systems, which falls under the Social and Information Networks (cs.SI) sub-category. Finally, the paper discusses the use of data analysis in HCI, which falls under the Machine Learning (cs.LG) sub-category.
